front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Specific Requirements - Part 17: Resilient Packet Ring (RPR) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications - Amendment 1 - Spatially Aware Sublayer
front.abstract: This amendment enables a service provider to use the architecture and protocols of IEEE Std 802.17TM-2004 to offer improvements in bandwidth utilization, by means of spatial reuse, for applications of RPR that involve bridging clients.
